import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-footer', templateUrl: './footer.component.html', styleUrls: ['./footer.component.css'] }) export class FooterComponent { overMouse:boolean=false; imgPokebola: string="../../../assets/images/logopokebola.png"; imgPokebolaAbierta: string="../../../assets/images/logopokebola.png"; cambiodeImg(_overMouse:boolean, _img:string){ } }
